name: Lagoon Lounge : The Poisonous Fountain
description: This is a visual novel containing furry characters and homosexual themes. You take on the role of a furry who has moved to a seaside village and become involved in the lives of its residents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, XP, 7, 10 (each 64bit only) Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
